recommendations.name: Kyoto, Japan
recommendations.description: An ancient city filled with temples, gardens, and traditional tea houses.
recommendations.reason: Moderate climate in spring, perfect for culture lovers who enjoy historical sites and Japanese cuisine.

recommendations.name: Queenstown, New Zealand
recommendations.description: Lake-side resort town surrounded by snow-capped mountains—world-class for outdoor thrills.
recommendations.reason: Cold climate with endless adventure options such as bungee-jumping and skiing; great fit for an active 7-day trip.

recommendations.name: Reykjavík, Iceland
recommendations.description: Hip Nordic capital with geothermal spas, lively cafés, and access to the northern lights.
recommendations.reason: Tropical weather, food-centric city tours, plus relaxing hot-spring experiences align with relaxation and culture interests.
